#Numi flux, Feb 12, from Arturo; from 1.5 GeV to 10 GeV
beam_type=0

# the PDG code of the beam particle
# 12 - nu_e    
# 14 - nu_mu
# 16 - nu_tau
# -12 - anti_nu_e
# -14 - anti_nu_mu
# -16 - anti_nu_tau

beam_particle      = 14

# The direction of the beam given as a 3 coordinates of the vector alligned with the beam

beam_direction     = 0 0 1

beam_energy = 100  10000  2.95137e-06  7.59867e-06  9.71354e-06  9.44186e-06  9.87952e-06  1.20274e-05  1.50982e-05  1.91288e-05  2.56924e-05  3.11133e-05  3.73223e-05  4.186e-05  4.80433e-05  5.31572e-05  5.63889e-05  5.85037e-05  6.15903e-05  6.4696e-05  6.88836e-05  7.30848e-05  7.86004e-05  8.14074e-05  8.60514e-05  9.03097e-05  9.43224e-05  9.79145e-05  0.000100756  0.000103746  0.000105593  0.000107876  0.000106816  0.000106886  0.000103496  0.000101658  9.6354e-05  9.01599e-05  8.52595e-05  7.84145e-05  7.09765e-05  6.34477e-05  5.6735e-05  5.03293e-05  4.41749e-05  3.89585e-05  3.43417e-05  3.0595e-05  2.66426e-05  2.42189e-05  2.16136e-05  1.93667e-05  1.76857e-05  1.57051e-05  1.46135e-05  1.31997e-05  1.25248e-05  1.17462e-05  1.09311e-05  1.00835e-05  9.76637e-06  9.285e-06  8.84123e-06  8.63889e-06  8.05974e-06  7.84418e-06  7.55452e-06  7.22049e-06  7.16972e-06  6.95183e-06  6.73771e-06  6.38784e-06  6.28768e-06  6.25958e-06  5.82291e-06  5.76321e-06  5.67005e-06  5.38649e-06  5.34887e-06  5.2019e-06  5.0607e-06  5.08572e-06  4.83827e-06  4.6868e-06  4.70082e-06  4.70537e-06  4.43688e-06  4.24763e-06  4.14469e-06  4.25042e-06  3.9722e-06  4.10638e-06  4.04395e-06  3.74274e-06  3.77639e-06  3.76015e-06  3.57511e-06  3.5518e-06  3.55839e-06  3.43927e-06  3.27244e-06
